title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Matt Mosley on Jason Peters Expectations, NFC East Predictions
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Matt Mosley on Jason Peters Expectations, NFC East Predictions
description:
First, (3:00) Colin explains the biggest unintended consequence of the college football transfer portal, if he would take Lincoln Riley over Nick Saban to build a program in 2022, and his obvious theory on the scorching California September.

Then, longtime Cowboys columnist - and host of The Doomsday Podcast - Matt Mosley joins Colin to discuss what are realistic expectations for 40 year-old tackle Jason Peters replacing Tyron Smith (17:00), if Jerry Jones is turning into Al Davis (19:00), if Mike McCarthy has an identifiable strength (27:00), if the Eagles are the NFC East favorites (32:00), and if the massive shift in CFB conference alignment and coming playoff expansion are good for the sport (40:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd   

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
